name: Ailment: Pixel Art Action Game
overview: In space, no one can hear you game... If you’re looking for a story-driven, action-packed, retro-styled game with lots of guns, hordes of enemies, super intense game-play with horror ambience and sci-fi movie references, then Ailment is the perfect choice for you. The main character wakes up in a med bay after being unconscious for three days and discovers all of his crew have become infected. The last thing he remembers is returning from another spaceship where he was on a top secret rescue mission, but when he arrived, everyone on the ship was already dead... Now he has to remember what happened to him and find out the truth.
